description: 挥动武器，对一个敌人造成伤害！
name: 普通攻击
note:
<setup action>
move user: target, FRONT base
</setup action>

description: 专注于防御，减少受到的伤害。
name: 防御
note:
当选择［防御］指令时，
将使用2号技能。

description:
精准，快速的对一个目标两次攻击，
能寻找到敌方的破绽！
name: 二连突刺
note:
<setup action>
move user: target, FRONT base
</setup action>

description:
挥动手中的武器，会两个敌人造成伤害！
就是不能确定会砍到谁！
name: 挥斩
note:
<SETUP ACTION>
ANIMATION 0122: user
ANIMATION WAIT: 10
<\SETUP ACTION>

description: 冲进对手群中，对随机的三个目标造成伤害。
name: 无畏冲击
note:
<setup action>
move user: target, FRONT base
</setup action>

description: 敌方角色的行动，撤离战斗。
name: 逃跑

description: 什么都不做。
name: 待机

description:
\P[1]的时代，没有战斗，所以敌人仔细观察的话，
会发现\P[1]其实很弱，因而放松警惕……
name: 弱小，可怜，又无助
note:
<Whole Action>

motion sleep: user
wait: 30
motion dead: user
wait: 30
Animation 147: enemies
Wait For Animation

</Whole Action>

description: 上前发挥快速的出招，对敌人的三个位置进行攻击。
name: 三连突进
note:
<setup action>
motion attack: user
wait for motion
move user: target, back BASE
wait for move
face user: target
attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
motion attack: user
wait for motion
move user: target, front BASE
wait for move
face user: target
attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
motion attack: user
wait for motion
motion attack: user
wait for motion
move user: target, back BASE
wait for move
face user: target
attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
</setup action>
<target action>
</target action>
<Follow ACTION>
</Follow ACTION>

description:
装备链锤的特有技能，利用链锤的特有属性，
进行两次快速的攻击！
name: 锤击！
note:
<setup action>
move user: target, FRONT base
</setup action>

description:
辰远提起武器，飞跃起来，
对目标进行跳斩攻击！造成巨量伤害！
name: 一刀两断
note:
<Setup Action>

move user: target, Front Head, 30

Wait For Movement

Animation 122: user

wait for animation

move user: target, base, 10

Wait For Movement

</Setup Action>

description:
辰远为目标施展强化，接下来的两回合，
目标的攻击力与魔法强度会得到很大提升！
name: 力量强化

description:
\P[1]的时代，没有战斗，所以敌人仔细观察的话，
会发现\P[1]其实很弱，因而放松警惕……
name: 弱小，可怜，又无助
note:
<setup action>

motion sleep: user
wait: 30
motion dead: user
wait: 30
Animation 147: all enemie
Wait For Animation
wait: 30

</setup action>

description:
释放自己长期的不满，使出作为异界使者的一套绝技！
对敌人造成一套八段真实伤害的攻击！并弱化对方攻击。
name: 放手一搏
note:
<setup action>
move user: target, FRONT base
</setup action>

description:
为单个队友进行治疗，如果对方受伤不算太严重，
效果还是比较明显的，但伤得太重会小幅度减少治疗效果
name: 治疗术
note:
<Target Action>


motion item: target

Animation 127: user

wait for animation

Animation 41: target

action effect

</Target Action>

description:
能吟唱土元素的魔法，是娜最擅长的法术！
基础伤害很高！但似乎提升的空间并不大……
name: 大地之抚
note:
<setup action>

motion spell: user, no weapon
wait: 5
Animation 128: user
motion missile: user, no weapon
wait: 20

</setup action>

description:
引导火元素进行攻击，但这个法术有一定的限制，
虽然基础伤害偏低，但在法力很强的人手里，是很可怕的
name: 炎能汇聚

description:
引导风的力量对目标进行攻击，这种让人很难防御的技能
可以穿透对手的魔抗，予以高抗性的敌人更高的伤害
name: 自然之息

description:
用寒冷的魔法，来削弱对手的防备，
在造成伤害的同时，削弱对手物理防御
name: 散花雪

description:
向一片区域释放地火魔法，
对单体造成大量的伤害！
name: 灼烧

description:
风的吹息技能，在狂暴的风下，目标的战斗力也会遭到
一定程度的削弱……
name: 息

description: 当法师开始使用近战攻击的时候……
name: 重击
note:
<setup action>
move user: target, FRONT base
</setup action>

description:
平静……冷静……
什么都没问题的……
name: 平静

description:

note:

description:

description:
用神奇的魔法光芒制裁所有对手！
如果对方受伤越严重，该技能伤害越高。
name: 闪耀吧！魔法之力！

description: 基于护甲的高穿透伤害
name: 破甲之击
note:
<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<target action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
move user: targets, FRONT base, 10
wait for movement
else
perform start
end
wait for movement
motion attack: user
action animation
wait for animation
action effect
</target action>

description:
平静一下，对自己的魔法能力进行调节，
恢复30%的已损失蓝量
name: 静心之术

description:
调整一下自己当前的战斗形式，整备战斗力，
恢复50%的已损失生命
name: 调整状态

description:
穿透性极强的风属性魔法！
伤害很高！就是很难发挥出全部威力。
name: 元素魔法-风

description:
比较普通的冰属性魔法，穿透性比火属性的高，
但是基础值并没有火属性强。
name: 元素魔法-冰

description:
比较普通的火属性魔法，穿透性比冰属性的低，
但是基础值比冰属性强。
name: 元素魔法-炎

description:
释放光的元素的力量，对目标造成毁灭性的伤害！
造成目标已损失10%的生命值的高额伤害！
name: 元素魔法-光

description:
\P[1]生活在和平年代，如果敌人仔细观察的话，
会发现\P[1]其实很弱，因而放松警惕……
message1: 让对手的防御力弱化了
name: 减防

description:
这一切都不是真的！
那么我一定有非凡的战斗力！
name: 无所畏惧！
跳斩技能测试
note:
<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<target action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
move user: targets, head, 20
wait for movement
move user: targets, base, 10
else
perform start
end
wait for movement
motion attack: user

attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
</target action>

description: 现在只差解决图层问题了
name: 上到下攻击(已经成功)
note:
<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<target action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
move user: targets, front head, 40
wait for movement
face target1:away from target2
move user: targets, front head, 15
wait for movement
face target1:away from target2
move user: targets, base, 10
wait for movement
face target1:away from target2
shake screen: 9, 5, 20
else
perform start
end
wait for movement
motion attack: user

attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
</target action>

name: 大神写的技能
note:
<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>
<target action>
camera focus: target, front
zoom: 120%, 30
wait for zoom
opacity not focus: 0%, 20
wait for opacity
move user: targets, back, 5
wait for movement
face user: target
motion attack: user
action animation
ani wait: 2
action effect
death break
move user: targets, front center, 5
face user: target
motion attack: user
ani wait: 3
action effect
death break
move user: targets, back top, 5
face user: target
ani wait: 3
action effect
death break
move user: targets, front, 5
face user: target
motion attack: user
ani wait: 3
action effect
death break
move user: targets, back center, 5
face user: target
motion attack: user
ani wait: 5
action effect
move user: targets, front, 10
immortal: target, false
jump user: 200%, 10
face user: forward
wait for animation
wait for movement
</target action>
<follow action>
reset zoom: 10
reset camera: 10
opacity not focus: 100%, 20
wait for opacity
clear battle log
</follow action>

name: 大招
note:

if $gameVariables.value(144) == 0
motion chant: actor 0, no weapon
else if $gameVariables.value(144) == 1
motion chant: actor 1, no weapon
else if $gameVariables.value(144) == 2
motion chant: actor 2, no weapon
else if $gameVariables.value(144) == 3
motion chant: actor 3, no weapon
end
